editorialSummary.text: Bright rooms & suites in a contemporary hotel offering a bar & a rooftop pool.

text.text:
Not Worth the Price – Disappointed by Service Despite Good Rooms

I stayed recently at Hilton Garden Inn, Lucknow, and while the cleanliness and room quality were quite good, these basics are expected at any decent hotel—especially when you’re paying premium rates for a 4-5 star property.

Unfortunately, the overall service was disappointing:

Room service was very poor. Whether it was a simple request like a Band-Aid or anything else, nothing came without repeated calls.

One evening it was raining heavily and no Ola/Uber was available. I was just 850 meters away and requested the hotel to help with a pickup. They refused, giving excuses, which was surprising for a brand like Hilton.

During dining, the staff seemed more focused on reminding guests to pay the bill rather than offering a warm dining experience. At least four staff members came, one after the other, just to remind me to settle the bill. No one even asked how the food was.

At check-out, I politely asked if I could go back to the room for a quick change of clothes, or if they could provide a small space. The response was a blunt “you can use the restroom, no other place will be allowed.” Not something you'd expect from a hospitality-first brand.

While the property itself is well-maintained, the staff attitude and service levels need serious improvement. I truly hope the management addresses these issues so future guests have a better experience.

Highly Recommended Stay at Hilton Garden Inn Hotel, Lucknow!
I had a really great time at the Hilton Hotel in Lucknow. The rooms were spacious, clean, and very well-maintained. The beds were extremely comfortable, making it easy to relax and unwind.
The food was absolutely delicious with a wide variety of options to choose from — something for every taste!

Overall, I highly recommend this hotel for anyone visiting Lucknow. Excellent service, great comfort, and an amazing experience!

text.text:
Food Quality and Service:

The overall quality of the food was subpar. Many attendees tasted the food but left their plates unfinished. Notably, chapatis were not served, and soup was unavailable. The excessive use of garlic in the dishes was also a common complaint among guests.

The food service appeared disorganized, giving the impression that it was complimentary rather than part of a paid event.

Service Staff Availability:

There was a noticeable lack of service staff attending to our VIP guests. Despite prior requests, no one approached them to offer tea, coffee, or other refreshments. We had to assign our own staff to ensure our guests were attended to appropriately.

Lack of Banquet Infrastructure:
Normally when we do our events at Taj, Lucknow, there is no dearth of front row sofas there. We had to struggle to find 6 wooden chairs at max, around 10 am, after the start of our program, to be placed for our special guests. When hotels like your offer such experience and availability of paraphernalia, it seems like a waste of money and trust bestowed.

This experience was disappointing.

From an unhappy client, best regards:

editorialSummary.text: Informal airport hotel offering a buffet restaurant & a rooftop grill, plus an outdoor pool.

text.text:
Dear Hotel Holiday Inn Team,

I am writing to share my recent experiences at your hotel, which have raised concerns about the food safety and hygiene standards. On August 12th, around 22:35, I dined at your evening buffet and was served Chicken Malai. Unfortunately, upon inspecting the dish, I found a hair in it. I immediately brought this to the attention of the Floor Chef and Duty Manager, who took the issue seriously and apologized for the inconvenience.

The Chef and Duty Manager offered to replace the dish, but given the nature of the issue, I decided not to continue with my meal. As a guest, it's unsettling to encounter such an incident, and it raises questions about the quality control measures in place.

Furthermore, I had a similar experience the previous day when I requested your floor team to send some fresh dishes from the buffet to my room as I returned late from a site visit. To my surprise, I received leftover food from the buffet, which was not what I had requested. This incident not only raised concerns about food handling but also made me question whether the hotel was prioritizing cost savings over serving fresh food to guests.

While I appreciate the prompt response from the Chef and Duty Manager regarding the hair incident, these experiences collectively raise concerns about the overall food safety and hygiene standards at your hotel. I understand that mistakes can happen, but I hope you'll take this feedback constructively and review your quality control processes to ensure the highest standards of food safety and hygiene.

I hope that you will take my feedback seriously and take necessary actions to address these concerns. I look forward to hearing from you and seeing improvements in your Service.

text.text:
I had a very disappointing and frustrating experience during my recent stay at Taj Mahal Lucknow (26th–27th August).

After using the swimming pool, I went to the gym shower where I found no hair oil, wet slippers, no laundry bag, and even the telephone was not working. There was also no staff present to assist. I had to use my personal phone to request hair oil, slippers, and a laundry bag. Even though I was assured multiple times that items were being sent, nobody ever came, and I wasted 30+ minutes waiting.

Worse, when I returned later from my meeting, I discovered that hotel staff had accessed my room without my permission. This is a serious breach of privacy and security, completely unacceptable in any hotel—let alone one under the Taj brand.

Despite escalating this matter to the duty manager, there was no proper resolution or accountability. The service was unprofessional, careless, and far below the standards one expects from a 5-star property.

I chose Taj Mahal Lucknow for its reputation, but my experience was extremely disappointing. I hope the management takes this complaint seriously and ensures no other guest faces such negligence and breach of trust.

Worse, when I returned later from my meeting, I discovered that hotel staff had accessed my room without my permission. This is a serious breach of privacy and security, completely unacceptable in any hotel—let alone one under the Taj brand.

Despite escalating this matter to the duty manager, there was no proper resolution or accountability. The service was unprofessional, careless, and far below the standards one expects from a 5-star property.

I chose Taj Mahal Lucknow for its reputation, but my experience was extremely disappointing. I hope the management takes this complaint seriously and ensures no other guest faces such negligence and breach of trust.

text.text:
Taj in its true essence. Absolute joy of the entire experience.

Rooms are splendid. Especially the ones facing the pool area. The hotel lobby personifies the Palace feel. Stairs going down the pool and recreation area have statues and paintings depicting old culture. One has to see them to believe this.

I haven't seen a better house phone booth ever in any hotel and telling you by the experience of staying across the World. House phone booth has statues in local dresses and you have to see them to believe it.

The swimming pool looks like it is from the Mughal era. There is a water fountain inside and around it.

The whole experience is truly like staying in a palace from the bygone era.

Food, whether it is in room dining or buffet, is flavourful and perfect. The buffet might have less to choose from but what is there is good.

Have stayed there quite a few times and it is a must to experience if you are in Lucknow on a visit.

text.text:
Taj Mahal, Lucknow is a perfect blend of luxury, tradition, and impeccable hospitality. From the moment you walk in, you're welcomed with warm smiles and top-notch service. The architecture and interiors reflect the rich cultural heritage of Lucknow, with elegant decor and thoughtful details throughout.

Rooms are spacious, well-appointed, and offer every comfort you'd expect from a premium hotel. The gardens and pool area are beautifully maintained, creating a peaceful and relaxing atmosphere.

The dining experience is exceptional—especially the Awadhi cuisine served at their in-house restaurant. Every dish is full of authentic flavors, beautifully presented, and served with care.

Whether you're in Lucknow for business or leisure, the Taj Mahal offers a truly memorable stay. Highly recommended for anyone looking to experience luxury with a local touch.

text.text:
**Subject: Extremely Disappointed with Taj Lucknow Service**

This is not my first stay at a Taj property, but unfortunately, my experience at *Taj Lucknow* has been the worst so far. Despite repeated complaints over the past **hour** regarding a non-functional AC, no effective action was taken until I escalated the issue to the **Duty Manager**. The lack of urgency and professionalism from the staff here is completely unacceptable.

To make matters worse, my earlier request to room service was mishandled with **incorrect food orders**—further reflecting the poor service standards at this property. Even stirrer wasn’t available with Tea!!

In contrast, my stays at Taj properties in **Patna, Bangalore, and other cities** have consistently been excellent. It’s disappointing to see such a stark drop in quality at Taj Lucknow. Guests choose Taj for its reputed service—sadly, this location does not live up to that promise.

**Think twice before booking**

text.text:
Warm and Welcoming Staff: Guests consistently highlight the friendliness and helpful attitude of the staff across all departments, from reception to housekeeping and restaurant service. Many specifically mention staff going the extra mile to ensure a seamless experience, with names like Himanshu Singh and Priyanka praised for their professionalism and care.

Spotless & Comfortable Rooms: The rooms are often described as immaculate, spacious, and comfortable. Housekeeping is prompt and maintains high standards of hygiene, making the rooms feel inviting and well-kept.

Excellent Food & Breakfast: Travelers love the food quality, especially the extensive breakfast buffet that offers both Indian and western cuisine. Many guests point out the delicious variety, while also appreciating the attentive service in the hotel's restaurants.

Prime Location: Hyatt Regency is situated in Gomti Nagar, one of Lucknow's best areas for accessing business, government offices, and leisure spots. The location is often cited as convenient and close to major city attractions.

Exceptional Hospitality: The overall experience at Hyatt Regency Lucknow earns frequent praise. Many note smooth check-in, warm greetings, and thoughtful touches such as packed breakfasts for guests with early departures. Multiple guests say the hotel's standards match those of Hyatt properties worldwide.

Modern Amenities & Facilities: The property is described as well-appointed with comprehensive amenities, including a well-maintained pool, fitness center, and event spaces. Guests enjoy the ambiance and overall atmosphere, describing it as both inviting and peaceful.

Value for Money: Though some reviewers note the hotel is on the pricier side, they generally feel it is justified by the level of comfort, service, and quality provided.

Repeat Visits and Recommendations: Many travelers express their intention to return and recommend the hotel to others, noting that their experiences have been consistently positive across multiple stays.

In conclusion, Hyatt Regency Lucknow is highly recommended for its exceptional staff, spotless and comfortable rooms, delicious food, and prime location, making it a favorite for both business and leisure travelers to the city

text.text:
**Disastrous Experience at Hotel Damson Plum**

My stay at Hotel Damson Plum was, without exaggeration, the worst hotel experience I have ever had. From the moment I arrived, I was met with unprofessional and indifferent staff at the front desk who seemed uninterested in guest concerns. The check-in process was unnecessarily slow and chaotic.

Upon entering my room, I was immediately disappointed by the lack of cleanliness. The bathroom had visible stains and a lingering unpleasant odor, and the towels provided were worn and scratchy. The bed linens appeared to be old and not properly laundered. Despite the hotel’s claim of modern amenities, I found the air conditioning barely functional and the Wi-Fi connection unreliable throughout my stay.

The noise from the hallway and adjacent rooms was constant, making it impossible to get a good night’s sleep. Housekeeping was inconsistent—some days my room was not cleaned at all, and when it was, it was done poorly.

The food quality in the restaurant was below par. The breakfast buffet was limited and lacked freshness, with several items running out quickly and not being replenished. Service in the restaurant was slow, and the staff seemed overwhelmed and inattentive.

The location, while near Lulu Mall, was not as convenient as advertised, and the area felt isolated at night. The hotel’s value for money is questionable given the poor quality of service and amenities.

Overall, I would strongly advise against staying at Hotel Damson Plum. There are much better options in Lucknow for a similar price, and this hotel did not live up to any of its promises.

text.text:
This is the worst hotel I have ever come across. Their rules and regulations are not just strict but completely illogical, making guests feel unwelcome and uncomfortable.

1. I booked the hotel online, but upon arrival, I was rudely told that I could only check in at 1 PM. They didn’t even allow me to sit in the waiting area, as if I was some outsider and not a paying guest!

2. My phone battery was about to die, and I politely requested to charge it for just 10 minutes at the reception. A staff member named Jitender Kumar flat-out refused, saying it's against hotel rules. Seriously? Which decent hotel denies such a basic request?

This place treats guests like a burden rather than customers. The staff is rude, the management is pathetic, and the policies are absurd. If you’re looking for a horrible experience filled with inconvenience and frustration, then go ahead and book this hotel. Otherwise, STAY AWAY!

This hotel was a complete disaster. The room was filthy and clearly not cleaned before our arrival. The bedspreads were stained and unchanged—absolutely unhygienic. The restroom was in terrible condition, with a foul smell and grime everywhere. It felt more like a neglected public toilet than a private hotel bathroom.

To be honest, even a public bathroom maintains better hygiene than this place. It was shocking and deeply disappointing, especially since we were traveling with elders and expected basic cleanliness and comfort.

We had to request a last-minute change late at night, which added unnecessary stress. This property should not be listed until it undergoes serious renovation and management overhaul.

editorialSummary.text: Unfussy rooms in an informal hotel with a vegetarian restaurant, Wi-Fi & a train station shuttle.

text.text:
I recently stayed at Hotel Nexus, Lucknow, and overall, it was a pleasant experience. The hotel is conveniently located just 700 meters from the railway station, making it a great choice for travelers looking for easy access.

The cleanliness of the hotel is commendable, with well-maintained rooms and common areas. The staff behavior was very polite and professional, always ready to assist with any requests. Room service was also efficient, ensuring a comfortable stay.

One minor issue we faced was that the TV in our room was not working on the first day, but upon informing the management, they promptly replaced it, which was a positive response. The only downside was that the food prices seemed a little high, though the quality was decent.

Overall, Hotel Nexus is a good option for those looking for a clean and comfortable stay near the station, with friendly staff and decent services. Just keep in mind the food pricing if you’re planning to dine in.

text.text:
We recently hosted our parents’ 50th anniversary celebration at Comfort Hotel Vista, and it was a truly wonderful experience from start to finish. Our family stayed for three nights, and we were thoroughly impressed with the accommodation, delicious food, and exceptional service throughout our stay.

The hotel staff were warm, professional, and attentive, ensuring every detail was taken care of — from room comfort to banquet arrangements. The venue was perfect for our celebration, and the team went out of their way to make it memorable for us and all our guests. Every small request was completed, and every detail was carefully attended to.

Both their banquet halls (Clove and Cinnamon) are spacious, well-kept, clean and added a great vibe to our celebration.

A special thanks to Shivani, who went above and beyond to ensure every detail of the event was flawless. Her professionalism, patience, and collaborative approach made the planning process smooth and stress-free — we couldn't have asked for a better coordinator.

I highly recommend Comfort Hotel Vista for both family events and extended stays in Lucknow. Thank you for making this milestone celebration so special for our family!

text.text:
I had a very disappointing experience at this hotel. Despite claiming to be a four-star property, the standards were far below even basic expectations.

Cleanliness: The hotel lacked basic hygiene. The rooms were dirty and had a bad odor, making the stay very uncomfortable.

Staff Behavior: The staff was untrained and unprofessional. They did not even know how to greet guests properly, which is very concerning for a hotel of this claimed standard.

Room Condition: The AC in the room was not working properly. I raised the issue at the reception, but there was no response or follow-up. The room condition overall was poor and not well-maintained.

Service: There was no promptness or courtesy in their service. Complaints were ignored, and no effort was made to improve the situation.

Overall, this was one of the worst hotel stays I have ever experienced. I would strongly advise others to avoid this place. It does not live up to its advertised rating and feels more like a fraud than a professional establishment.

never go to this hotel i suggest every one

text.text:
I had high expectations from the Independence Day lunch buffet at Renaissance, especially given the premium pricing of ₹2000 per person. Unfortunately, the experience was quite disappointing.

The buffet lacked both variety and taste. The spread felt very ordinary, with nothing that stood out or justified the festive occasion. For such a reputed property, I was expecting more creativity, better flavors, and at least some signature dishes, but the food was bland and repetitive.

On the positive side, the ambience and service were decent, but ac was not working and when you go for a buffet, the food should be the highlight—and here it clearly wasn’t. Overall, not worth the price charged.

text.text:
Hilton Garden Inn in Vibhuti Khand, Gomti Nagar, Lucknow, offers a wonderful blend of comfort, luxury, and fine dining. The Garden Grille and Bar, the hotel’s multi-cuisine restaurant, is a standout feature. With delicious à la carte options, sumptuous buffets, and a cook-to-order menu, it caters to all tastes. The live kitchen counters and wood-fired oven add an exciting touch to the dining experience, and the private and outdoor dining options provide a delightful ambiance for any occasion.

The property itself is impressive, boasting an outdoor swimming pool perfect for a refreshing dip, and a well-equipped fitness center with world-class equipment. It’s a great place to relax and unwind, whether you’re a guest or just visiting. For those looking to host events, the hotel offers multiple meeting rooms, making it an ideal venue for both business and social gatherings.

Free Wi-Fi access ensures that staying connected is never an issue, and the elegant accommodation options—from Guest Rooms to Executive Suites—are well-appointed and thoughtfully designed.

Overall, Hilton Garden Inn offers a fantastic experience, whether you’re enjoying a meal, attending an event, or simply relaxing by the pool. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a sophisticated and welcoming environment in Lucknow!

Wonderful experience staying here. The rooms, the food, the service, the front-desk is prompt & amazing.
Self parking or valet parking- sufficient space for cars in the open or basement. I will suggest to avail valet services, do not park on your own in basement, only 1 ramp for going down & coming up & construction material is dumped in basement.
Chargers are there at the hotel for electric cars.
Another wing of the hotel is under construction.
They have a small Gym with sufficient machines & weights.
Nice & clean pool on terrace.
Electric kettle & tea/Coffee pouches provided in room. A small fridge too is provided in room.

text.text:
Hotel Taj Mahal in Lucknow is truly a gem in the city, blending luxury with the charm of Nawabi heritage. Here are some highlights that make it a fantastic choice for both leisure and business stays:

1. Elegant Architecture and Ambience

The architecture and decor reflect the grandeur of Lucknow's Mughal and Awadhi heritage. From opulent interiors to intricate detailing, every corner of the hotel exudes a royal vibe. The lobby and lounge areas are spacious and beautifully designed, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere.

2. Luxurious and Comfortable Rooms

Rooms are spacious, well-appointed, and offer stunning views of the city or lush gardens. The decor combines modern comforts with classic design elements, including plush beds, modern bathrooms, and high-quality amenities. The rooms are maintained with utmost cleanliness, and the staff provides excellent turndown service.

3. Exceptional Dining Options

The dining experience at Hotel Taj Mahal, Lucknow, is unmatched. The hotel offers multiple restaurants, each specializing in a unique cuisine:

Oudh: Known for authentic Awadhi cuisine, including biryanis, kebabs, and traditional Lucknawi dishes.

Falaknuma: A rooftop dining venue with stunning city views, offering a variety of Indian and international dishes.

Mehfil: For tea, coffee, and light snacks, perfect for casual conversations or business meet-ups.

The food is prepared with attention to detail, and the chefs provide an unforgettable culinary journey that celebrates the city’s flavors.

4. Outstanding Service

The staff at the Taj Mahal Hotel is incredibly courteous, attentive, and ready to assist with a warm smile. They go out of their way to accommodate special requests, whether it’s for dietary preferences, event planning, or local sightseeing advice. The service is prompt, making guests feel valued and well taken care of.

5. Recreational Facilities and Amenities

For relaxation, the hotel provides a well-maintained swimming pool, a luxurious spa, and a modern fitness center. There are also beautiful landscaped gardens where guests can unwind. The spa offers various rejuvenating treatments, allowing guests to relax and de-stress in a peaceful environment.

6. Prime Location

Conveniently located, the hotel offers easy access to Lucknow’s main attractions, like Hazratganj, the Bara Imambara, and other cultural sites. It’s an ideal spot for those looking to explore the city's historic sites and shopping destinations.

7. Impeccable Cleanliness and Hygiene

Known for its high standards of hygiene, Hotel Taj Mahal has implemented stringent cleanliness protocols. Rooms, dining areas, and common spaces are sanitized thoroughly, ensuring a safe and comfortable stay for guests.

Final Verdict

Hotel Taj Mahal, Lucknow, delivers an unforgettable experience with its blend of luxury, traditional charm, and exceptional service. It’s a five-star choice that provides a warm welcome and luxurious retreat for both locals and visitors.

text.text:
The Taj Mahal Hotel in Lucknow, often referred to simply as Taj Mahal Lucknow, is a premier luxury hotel that has consistently received high praise from its guests. Located in the heart of Lucknow, the hotel combines traditional Indian hospitality with modern amenities, making it a preferred choice for both business and leisure travelers.

Historical Background

Originally opened in the mid-1990s, the hotel has undergone several transformations. It started as the Taj Residency before being rebranded as Vivanta, and finally, after a recent extensive renovation, it stands as the full-fledged Taj Mahal Hotel. This evolution reflects the hotel's commitment to maintaining high standards and adapting to the competitive landscape.

Rooms and Suites

The Taj Mahal Hotel, Lucknow, offers a range of accommodations, from standard rooms to opulent suites. Guests frequently highlight the impeccable cleanliness and comfort of the rooms. The suites, in particular, are noted for their spaciousness and luxurious touches. An upgrade to a suite often includes added perks such as complimentary meals and early check-in options, enhancing the overall guest experience.

Dining

The hotel boasts multiple dining options, each providing a unique culinary experience. The on-site restaurants serve a variety of cuisines, with particular praise for the quality of breakfast, lunch, and dinner offerings. Guests have singled out the morning flute music and the delicious jalebi as memorable aspects of their dining experience. In-room dining also receives high marks for its quality and convenience.

Facilities

The Taj Mahal Hotel, Lucknow, features a range of facilities designed to cater to the needs of its guests. The swimming pool and garden area provide a serene environment for relaxation and leisure. The hotel's gym, while functional, has received mixed reviews, with some guests noting issues with temperature control and equipment quality.

Service

One of the standout features of the Taj Mahal Hotel, Lucknow, is its exceptional service. Guests consistently praise the staff for their politeness, helpfulness, and attentiveness. From the reception to room service and luggage assistance, the staff’s commitment to guest satisfaction is evident. Specific employees are often mentioned by name in reviews, highlighting the personalized service that guests appreciate.

Areas for Improvement

While the overall feedback is overwhelmingly positive, there are occasional criticisms. Some guests have pointed out issues with the room temperature, finding it difficult to adjust the thermostat to a comfortable level. Additionally, the gym facilities have been described as basic and not up to the standard expected from a luxury hotel.

Summary

The Taj Mahal Hotel, Lucknow, stands out as one of the city’s finest luxury hotels, offering a blend of traditional elegance and modern convenience. Its strengths lie in its high-quality service, luxurious accommodations, and excellent dining options. Although there are minor areas for improvement, particularly regarding the gym and room temperature control, the overall guest experience is highly positive. The hotel's ability to create memorable stays through personalized service and attention to detail makes it a top choice for visitors to Lucknow.

For anyone planning to visit Lucknow, the Hotel promises a stay marked by luxury.

I had a truly fantastic stay at Courtyard by Marriott, Lucknow. From the moment I arrived, everything was managed with professionalism and genuine hospitality. The rooms were cozy, clean, and thoughtfully designed, and the bathrooms were modern and well-maintained. The service throughout the stay was exceptional—every request was addressed promptly, making the experience smooth and enjoyable.

One of the standout features was the breakfast buffet—a delightful spread with a wide variety of fresh and delicious options to suit every palate. It was the perfect way to start each day.

I must give a special mention to Manager Jitendra, who made a real difference in the entire experience. I had contacted him even before making the booking, and he was incredibly helpful, guiding me through the process and ensuring all my requirements were met. He stayed in touch, kept track of my arrival, and ensured that everything I had requested was arranged exactly as discussed. His personal attention and proactive coordination were truly commendable.

Overall, it was a memorable and satisfying stay, and I would wholeheartedly recommend Courtyard by Marriott, Lucknow to anyone visiting the city.

text.text:
Hyatt Regency Lucknow stands as a premier 5-star luxury hotel nestled in the heart of Uttar Pradesh. Strategically situated in the bustling central business district of Lucknow, it is conveniently located just a 30-minute drive from Chaudhary Charan Singh International Airport. The hotel is also a mere four minutes away from the High Court, as well as various corporate offices and vibrant shopping areas. With a total of 206 elegantly appointed rooms, including 19 luxurious suites, guests can enjoy stylish accommodations adorned with warm wood tones and subtle local design elements. Each room provides breathtaking views of either the city skyline or the serene pool area, ensuring a tranquil retreat for visitors. Guests can indulge in a delightful array of gourmet coffee and tea selections, alongside a tempting menu featuring sandwiches, light meals, freshly baked breads, savory snacks, and an assortment of cakes and pastries.

Positioned in the rapidly developing IT hub of Vibhuti Khand in Gomti Nagar, Hyatt Regency Lucknow serves as an ideal venue for various events, from large conferences and annual meetings to intimate board gatherings. The hotel also excels as a stunning wedding destination, where meticulous attention is given to every detail, ensuring that each celebration is unique and memorable. For added convenience, the hotel offers complimentary valet parking services, making it easy for guests to arrive and depart without hassle. The proximity to key transportation hubs, such as Chaudhary Charan Singh International Airport, located 25 kilometers away, and Lucknow Charbagh Railway Station, just 11.4 kilometers from the hotel, further enhances its appeal for both business and leisure travelers.

From the moment we stepped into the welcoming embrace of Damson Plum, we knew our stay would be extraordinary. Every aspect of this hotel is meticulously designed to create an atmosphere of tranquility and comfort.

The rooms are elegantly furnished, offering a perfect blend of modern amenities and cozy charm. The plush beds envelop you in luxury, ensuring a restful night's sleep. And the breathtaking views from our window made waking up a joy every morning.

The staff at Damson Plum exemplify hospitality at its finest. From the warm greeting at check-in to the attentive service throughout our stay, they went above and beyond to ensure our comfort and satisfaction. Special mention to the concierge team who were invaluable in helping us navigate the city and discover hidden gems.

Dining at Damson Plum was an experience in itself. The restaurant boasts a diverse menu of exquisite dishes, each prepared with fresh, locally sourced ingredients. text.text:
This hotel is one of the best hotels near Lulu Mall and Medanta Hospital. We had booked 1  room here as our father was admitted in Medanta for a surgery and only 1 attendant could stay at Medanta. The price is a bit on the higher side, but i will say it is worth it. The rooms were spacious with a small fridge, electric kettle, good lighting,  a window and a bath with all toiletries. The best part of the Hotel is the restaurant (The Clove). They also have a bar menu.   The prices are again a bit higher. However,  the  taste, quality and  portion of food was just vow! We tried South Indian, English breakfast, North Indian, Thai and every food had its unique taste.

1 recommendation - they can improve their wifi because sometimes the internet browsing speed will fall drastically.

Overall, we had a very comfortable stay.!

text.text:
Comfort Hotel Vista, located in Lucknow, has garnered positive reviews across various platforms, reflecting its commitment to providing guests with a comfortable and memorable stay.

Location and Ambience

Guests frequently commend the hotel for its strategic location and pleasant ambience. One reviewer noted the hotel's "good location and ambience," highlighting its accessibility and the welcoming atmosphere that guests experience upon arrival.

Staff and Service

The hotel's staff receives high praise for their professionalism and courteous demeanor. Visitors have described the staff's behavior as exemplary, with one guest mentioning, "Hotel staff behaviour is good," emphasizing the team's dedication to ensuring a pleasant stay for all guests.

Cleanliness and Maintenance

Cleanliness is a standout feature at Comfort Hotel Vista. Guests have consistently highlighted the hotel's commitment to hygiene, with comments such as "Hotel is very hygienic," reflecting the meticulous attention to maintaining a clean environment.

Culinary Experience

The hotel's culinary offerings have delighted many guests. The rooftop café, Purple Basil, has been particularly noted for its diverse menu and quality. Guests have expressed satisfaction with the dining options, stating that the food is "delicious," which adds to the overall positive experience at the hotel.

Facilities and Amenities

Comfort Hotel Vista boasts a range of facilities designed to cater to both leisure and business travelers. The property features 42 well-appointed rooms and expansive banquet spaces capable of accommodating up to 1,000 guests, offering both indoor and outdoor options. This makes it an ideal venue for events and gatherings.

Guest Satisfaction

Overall, guests have expressed high levels of satisfaction with their stays. The combination of excellent service, comfortable accommodations, and a welcoming atmosphere has led many to recommend the hotel to others. One guest aptly summarized their experience by stating that Comfort Hotel Vista is "one of the beautiful and elegant hotels in Lucknow," underscoring the hotel's reputation for excellence.

In conclusion, Comfort Hotel Vista in Lucknow stands out as a preferred choice for travelers seeking quality accommodations, exceptional service, and a memorable stay experience.

text.text:
Outstanding Comfort and Convenience at Comfort Vista Hotels

I recently had the pleasure of staying at several Comfort Inn hotels, and I can confidently say that they consistently exceed expectations in terms of comfort, service, and overall experience. From the moment you step into a Comfort Inn, you are greeted by a warm, welcoming atmosphere and friendly staff who are eager to make your stay enjoyable.

Comfortable Accommodations

The rooms at Comfort Vista are incredibly comfortable and well-appointed. Each room is designed with the guest’s comfort in mind, featuring plush bedding, ample lighting, and a range of modern amenities. The beds are particularly noteworthy, offering a perfect blend of softness and support, ensuring a restful night’s sleep. Additionally, the rooms are impeccably clean and well-maintained, providing a fresh and inviting environment.

Excellent Service
The staff at Comfort Vista hotels are truly exceptional. From the front desk to housekeeping, everyone is dedicated to providing top-notch service. Check-in and check-out processes are smooth and efficient, and any requests or concerns are handled promptly and courteously. The staff’s local knowledge is also a plus, offering great recommendations for dining, attractions, and activities in the area.

Convenient Locations
Comfort Vista  hotels are strategically located, making them ideal for both business and leisure travelers. Whether you are in the heart of a bustling city or in a quieter suburban area, you will find that Comfort Inn properties are conveniently situated near major highways, airports, and popular attractions. This makes it easy to explore the local area or get to your next destination without hassle.

Amenities and Breakfast
One of the standout features of Comfort Vista hotels is their complimentary breakfast. Each morning, guests can enjoy a delicious and varied spread, including hot and cold options, fresh fruits, and beverages. This is a great way to start the day, providing both convenience and value. Additionally, many Comfort Vista locations offer amenities such as free Wi-Fi, fitness centers, and business facilities, which enhance the overall guest experience.

Value for Money
Comfort Vista offers excellent value for money. The combination of comfortable accommodations, superb service, and convenient locations comes at a very reasonable price point. Whether you are traveling for business or leisure, you can trust that you will receive a high-quality experience without breaking the bank.

In conclusion, Comfort Vista hotels consistently deliver a superior guest experience with their comfortable rooms, exceptional service, convenient locations, and excellent amenities. They truly live up to their name, providing a comfortable and welcoming retreat for travelers. I highly recommend Comfort Vista to anyone looking for reliable, high-quality accommodations.

text.text:
I had a pleasant party at the hotel overall. The staff was welcoming, the hotel was well-maintained, and the amenities were excellent. The ambiance of the hotel was inviting, and the service was top-notch, making for a comfortable and enjoyable experience.

However, the food was just average. While it wasn’t bad, it didn’t quite match the quality of the rest of the hotel. Some dishes lacked flavor, and the variety was a bit limited. I expected a more refined dining experience given how well everything else was managed.

That being said, the hotel has many great aspects that make it worth visiting. If they could improve the food quality and offer a bit more variety, it would truly elevate the experience. I would still recommend staying here, especially for the excellent service and comfortable accommodations.

text.text:
I had a wonderful stay at the Renaissance hotel in Lucknow. The service was impeccable, the staff was friendly and helpful, and the rooms were spacious and comfortable.
The rooms had all the amenities I needed, such as a TV, a fridge, a coffee maker, and a safe. The beds were cozy and the pillows were fluffy. The bathroom was clean and well-stocked with toiletries.

The hotel has a very nice breakfast buffet with a variety of dishes to suit every taste. There were fresh fruits, juices, and pastries. The restaurant on the top floor has a great view of the city and the Ambedkar Park, which is just a short walk away.
The park is a beautiful place to relax and enjoy the architecture.  It has a large statue of Dr. B.R. Ambedkar, the chief architect of the Indian Constitution, and a museum dedicated to his life and work.

The hotel is also close to other attractions and shopping centers, such as the Bara Imambara, the Rumi Darwaza, and the Hazratganj market. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Lucknow.

text.text:
Renaissance is the tallest hotel in Lucknow. Embrace refined comfort in tastefully appointed accommodations with modern interiors, deluxe amenities and plush furniture featuring innovative Smart glass. Delight your palate with distinctive international cuisine at our stylish hotel restaurants. Discover intriguing attractions in and around Gomti Nagar, including Hazratganj, Charbagh railway station, Indira Gandhi Pratishthan and Ambedkar Memorial Park. Sit back and relax after a day of business or exploration with a swim in our rooftop infinity pool or cocktails at our stylish 16th-floor rooftop bar.
Facilities:-
*Restaurant
*Fitness center
*Outdoor pool
*Meeting space
*Laundry
*Room service
*Check in – 3:00 pm
*Check out – 12:00 pm
*About your pet – No pet allowed ...

text.text:
I stayed at Renaissance Lucknow after two years and it felt just like coming home again. The staff is warm and welcoming and they make sure every guest feels special. The front desk team was helpful and made the check-in smooth and quick.

The room was clean spacious and had a beautiful view of the city. The food was delicious and the entire atmosphere of the hotel was calm and relaxing. Every part of my stay was handled with care and professionalism.

A big thank you to the team for such a wonderful experience. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Lucknow. I will definitely be coming back.

highlightedText.text: "Their hospitality, cleanliness, service, and comfort is unmatched."

text.text:
Lemon Tree has outdone itself yet another time for my wife and I. Over the years we have developed a fondness for this chain of hotels. Their hospitality, cleanliness, service, and comfort is unmatched. I unfortunately do not remember all of the pleasant staff names. Some of them that made our stay memorable were Neeraj from house-keeping, Amit & Saurav from F&B. It is because of the exceptional service delivered by the staff, it is a given that our first preference for a hotel is always going to be Lemon Tree.

Yet, I've given it 4 stars and not 5. We did not get a good variety of Lucknow / Awadhi cuisine at the Citrus cafe in the hotel. Also, there was always some noise disturbance from outside the room during the day.
